metadata.title: CVE-2021-47033 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mt76:mt7615: fix tx skb dma unmap The first pointer in the txp needs to beunmapped as well, otherwise it will leak DMA mapping entries

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
